anya-e0103n1:97_11: ekaṁ, ‘‘yātrā ca me bhavissatī’’ti ekaṁ, ‘‘anavajjatā cā’’ti ekaṁ. Phāsuvihāro pana
anya-e0103n1:97_12: bhojanānisaṁsoti. Evaṁ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṁ āhāraṁ āhārento paṭisaṅkhā yoniso piṇḍapātaṁ paṭisevati nāma.
anya-e0103n1:98_0: Yattha yatthāti bhummaniddesena sena-saddassa adhikaraṇatthavuttimāha. Tathā āsana-saddassāti.
anya-e0103n1:98_1: Aḍḍhayogādimhīti ādi-saddena pāsādādiṁ, mañcādiñca saṅgaṇhāti. Yattha yattha vihāre
anya-e0103n1:98_2: vā aḍḍhayogādimhi vā āsatīti vihāraaḍḍhayogādike ānetvā sambandhitabbaṁ. Idha ādi-saddena
anya-e0103n1:98_3: pīṭhasanthatādīnampi saṅgaho veditabbo. Parisahanaṭṭhenāti abhibhavanaṭṭhena, vibādhanaṭṭhenāti
anya-e0103n1:98_4: attho. Utuyeva utuparissayoti sītuṇhādiutuyeva asappāyo vuttanayena utuparissayo.
anya-e0103n1:98_5: Tassa utuparissayassa vinodanatthaṁ, anuppannassa anuppādanatthaṁ, uppannassa vūpasamanatthañcāti
anya-e0103n1:98_6: attho. Nānārammaṇato paṭisaṁharitvā kammaṭṭhānabhūte ekasmiṁyeva ārammaṇe cittassa
anya-e0103n1:98_7: sammadeva layanaṁ paṭisallānaṁ, tattha ārāmo abhirati paṭisallānārāmo, tadatthaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:98_8: Senāsanaṁ hi vivittaṁ yogino bhāvanānukūlaṁ suññāgārabhāvato. Taṁ panetaṁ atthadvayaṁ
anya-e0103n1:98_10: ekībhāvahetukaṁ sukhaṁ ekībhāvasukhaṁ, tadatthaṁ. Gaṇasaṅgaṇikakilesasaṅgaṇikābhāvena uppajjanakasukhaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:99_0: Yadi utuyeva utuparissayo, ‘‘utu ca sītuṇha’’nti sītuṇhapaṭighātaṁ vatvā utuparissayavinodanaṁ
anya-e0103n1:99_1: kasmā vuttanti codanaṁ sandhāyāha ‘‘kāmañcā’’tiādi. Tattha ‘‘niyataṁ utuparissayavinodana’’nti
anya-e0103n1:99_2: etena ‘‘sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa paṭighātāyā’’ti ettha vuttaṁ sītuṇhaṁ aniyataṁ
anya-e0103n1:99_3: kadāci kadāci uppajjanakaṁ, utuparissayo pana sabbadābhāvī adhippetoti dasseti. Vuttappakāroti
anya-e0103n1:99_4: ‘‘sītādiko, asappāyo’’ti ca evaṁ vuttappakāro vivaṭaṅgaṇarukkhamūlādīsu nisinnassa
anya-e0103n1:99_6: ca bhikkhussa kāyacittānaṁ ābādhaṁ kareyyuṁ. Yattha gutte senāsane ābādhaṁ na karonti.
anya-e0103n1:99_7: Evaṁ jānitvāti ubhayaparissayarahitanti evaṁ ñatvā paṭisevanto bhikkhu veditabboti sambandho.
anya-e0103n1:100_2: hoti. Yassa kassacīti sappiādīsu yassa kassaci. Sappāyassāti hi tassa vikāravūpasamenāti
anya-e0103n1:100_3: adhippāyo. Bhisakkassa kammaṁ tena vidhātabbato. Tenāha ‘‘tena anuññātattā’’ti. Nagaraparikkhārehīti
anya-e0103n1:100_4: nagaraṁ parivāretvā rakkhaṇakehi. Vivaṭaparikkhepo parikkhā uḍḍāpo pākāro esikā paligho
anya-e0103n1:100_6: . Ariyamaggo hi idha ‘‘ratho’’ti adhippeto. Tassa ca sammāvācādayo alaṅkāraṭṭhena
anya-e0103n1:100_8: sammā uddhaṁ uddhaṁ ānetabbā pariyesitabbā. Parivāropi hoti antarāyānaṁ parito vāraṇato.
anya-e0103n1:101_0: Tattha antaranti vivaraṁ, okāsoti attho. Verikānaṁ antaraṁ adatvā attano sāmikānaṁ
anya-e0103n1:101_1: parivāretvā ṭhitasevakā viya rakkhaṇato. Assāti jīvitassa. Kāraṇabhāvatoti cirappavattiyā
anya-e0103n1:101_2: kāraṇabhāvato. Rasāyanabhūtaṁ hi bhesajjaṁ sucirampi kālaṁ jīvitaṁ pavattetiyeva.
anya-e0103n1:101_3: Yadipi anuppannā eva dukkhavedanā bhesajjaparibhogena paṭihaññanti, na uppannā tāsaṁ
anya-e0103n1:101_4: saraseneva bhijjanato, uppannasadisā pana ‘‘uppannā’’ti vuccanti. Bhavati hi taṁsadisesu
anya-e0103n1:101_5: tabbohāro, yathā sā eva tittiri, tāniyeva osadhānīti. Tasmā vuttaṁ ‘‘uppannānanti
anya-e0103n1:101_6: jātānaṁ bhūtānaṁ nibbattāna’’nti. Sañcayato paṭṭhāya so dhātukkhobho samuṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0103n1:101_7: etesanti taṁsamuṭṭhānā. ‘‘Dukkhavedanā’’ti vatvā sā akusalasabhāvāpi atthīti tato
anya-e0103n1:101_9: byābajjhaṁ, dukkhanti attho. Natthi ettha byābajjhanti abyābajjhaṁ, niddukkhatā.
anya-e0103n1:101_10: Tenāha ‘‘abyābajjhaparamatāyā’’ti niddukkhaparamatāyāti. Taṁ dukkhanti roganimittakaṁ dukkhaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:102_0: Cīvarādīnaṁ paccayānaṁ nissayanaṁ paribhogo evāti dassetuṁ ‘‘te paṭicca nissāyā’’ti
anya-e0103n1:102_1: vatvā ‘‘paribhuñjamānā’’ti vuttaṁ. Pavattantīti jīvanti. Jīvanampi hi pavattanaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:104_0: 19. Evaṁ pātimokkhasaṁvarādibhedena niddiṭṭhaṁ sīlaṁ puna sādhanavibhāgena dassetuṁ
anya-e0103n1:104_1: ‘‘evametasmi’’ntiādimāraddhaṁ. Tattha sādhīyati sampādiyati etenāti sādhanaṁ, saddhā
anya-e0103n1:104_2: sādhanaṁ etassāti saddhāsādhano. Nanu ca vīriyasatipaññāhipi vinā pātimokkhasaṁvaro
anya-e0103n1:104_3: na sijjhatīti? Saccaṁ na sijjhati, saddhāya pana visesahetubhāvaṁ sandhāya evaṁ vuttanti dassento āha
anya-e0103n1:105_1: tassa tassa aparādhassa anurūpaṁ sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṁ nāma sāvakānaṁ avisayo, buddhānaṁ
anya-e0103n1:105_2: eva visayo. Sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṁ tāva tiṭṭhatu, tassa kālopi nāma sāvakānaṁ avisayo,
anya-e0103n1:105_3: buddhānaṁ eva visayoti dassento ‘‘sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanapaṭikkhepo cettha nidassana’’nti
anya-e0103n1:105_4: āha. Tathā hi vuttaṁ ‘‘āgamehi tvaṁ sāriputta, āgamehi tvaṁ sāriputta, tathāgatova
anya-e0103n1:105_5: tattha kālaṁ jānissatī’’ti (pārā. 21). Tattha ca-saddo samuccayattho. Tena ‘‘apaññattaṁ
anya-e0103n1:105_6: na paññapema, paññattaṁ na samucchindāma, yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vattāmā’’ti
anya-e0103n1:105_7: (pārā. 565) evamādīnaṁ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Saddhāyāti saddahanena satthari, dhamme
anya-e0103n1:105_8: ca saddhāya paccupaṭṭhāpanena. Jīvitepi pageva jīvitaparikkhāreti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n1:106_0: Kikīva aṇḍanti kikīsakuṇikā viya attano aṇḍaṁ. Sā kira jīvitampi pariccajitvā aṇḍameva
anya-e0103n1:106_1: rakkhati. Camarīva vāladhinti camarīmigo viya attano vāladhiṁ. Camarīmigā kira byādhena
anya-e0103n1:106_2: paripātiyamānā jīvitampi pariccajitvā kaṇḍakagumbādīsu laggaṁ attano vālameva rakkhanti.
anya-e0103n1:106_3: Piyaṁva puttaṁ ekakanti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṁ. Yathā hi ekaputtako kuṭumbiko taṁ
anya-e0103n1:106_4: ekaputtaṁ, ekanayano ca taṁ ekanayanaṁ suṭṭhutaraṁ rakkhati. Tatheva sīlaṁ anurakkhamānakāti
anya-e0103n1:106_5: anukampanavasena vuttaṁ. Supesalāti suṭṭhu piyasīlā. Sadā sabbakālaṁ daharamajjhimatherakālesu.
anya-e0103n1:106_6: Channampi gāravānaṁ vasena sagāravā, garukāravantoti attho.
anya-e0103n1:107: Evameva khoti yathā mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṁ nātikkamati, evameva. Mama sāvakāti ariyasāvake sandhāyāha. Te hi dhuvasīlā. Imasmiṁ attheti jīvitahetupi sīlassa avītikkamane.
anya-e0103n1:108: Mahāvattaniaṭavī nāma viñjhāṭavī. Himavantapasse aṭavīti keci. Theranti nāmagottavasena apaññātaṁ ekaṁ theraṁ. Nipajjāpesuṁ gantvā kassaci mā āroceyyāti.
anya-e0103n1:109_0: Pūtilatāyāti gaḷocilatāya. Samasīsīti jīvitasamasīsī. Yassa hi kilesasīsaṁ avijjaṁ
anya-e0103n1:109_1: maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattamaggo pariyādiyati, tato ekūnavīsatime paccavekkhaṇañāṇe
anya-e0103n1:109_2: patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgottaraṇe vaṭṭasīsaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ cuticittaṁ pariyādiyati, so imāya
anya-e0103n1:109_3: vārasamatāya ‘‘jīvitasamasīsī’’ti vuccati. So ca thero tathā parinibbāyi. Tena vuttaṁ
anya-e0103n1:109_4: ‘‘samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyī’’ti. Abhayatthero kira mahābhiñño. Tasmā cetiyaṁ kārāpesīti
anya-e0103n1:109_5: vadanti. Appevāti appeva nāma attano jīvitampi jaheyya, na bhindeti na bhindeyya, na vītikkameyya.
anya-e0103n1:110_0: Satiyāadhiṭṭhitānanti pageva upaṭṭhitāya satiyā ārakkhavasena adhiṭṭhitānaṁ indriyānaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:110_1: Ananvāssavanīyatoti dvārabhāvena abhijjhādīhi ananubandhitabbato. Varanti seṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:110_2: Tattāyāti uṇhāya. Ādittāyāti ādito paṭṭhāya dittāya. Sampajjalitāyāti samantato jalantiyā.
anya-e0103n1:110_3: Sajotibhūtāyāti ekajālībhūtāya. Sampalimaṭṭhanti sabbaso āmaṭṭhaṁ, añcitanti attho.
anya-e0103n1:110_4: Na tveva varanti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṁ. Rūpesūti rūpārammaṇesu. Anubyañjanaso nimittaggāhoti
anya-e0103n1:110_5: kilesānaṁ anu anu byañjanavasena uppādanena pākaṭīkaraṇavasena subhādinimittaggāho,
anya-e0103n1:110_6: atha vā anubyañjanasoti hatthapādādianubyañjanato, nimittaggāhoti itthipurisādisubhādinimittaggahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:110_9: sammā avihitavatiparikkhepaṁ. Parassahārīhīti parasantakāvahārakehi corehi. Samativijjhatīti
anya-e0103n1:111_0: Rūpesūti rūpahetu rūpanimittaṁ. Uppajjanakaanatthato rakkha indriyanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n1:111_1: Evaṁ sesesu. Ete hi dvārāti ete cakkhādidvārā. Satikavāṭena asaṁvutattā vivaṭā. Tato
anya-e0103n1:111_2: eva arakkhitā. Kilesuppattiyā hetubhāvena taṁsamaṅginaṁ hanantīti kāraṇūpacāreneva
anya-e0103n1:111_3: vuttaṁ. Ete vā rūpādayo. Kilesānaṁ ārammaṇabhūtā dvārā cakkhādidvārā. Te kīdisā vivaṭā
anya-e0103n1:111_4: arakkhitā asaṁvutacakkhādihetuṁ taṁsamaṅginaṁ hanantīti kāraṇūpacāreneva vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:111_5: Agāranti gehaṁ. Ducchannanti na sammā chāditaṁ. Abhāvitanti lokuttarabhāvanārahitaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:112_0: Sampāditetiādissa vodānapakkhassa attho vuttavipariyāyena veditabbo. Ayaṁ pana sabbaso
anya-e0103n1:112_1: kilesānaṁ anuppādo atiukkaṭṭhadesanā maggenāgatasadisattā. Sampādetabboti ‘‘na punevaṁ
anya-e0103n1:113_0: Adhunāpabbajitenāti na cirapabbajitena, navapabbajitenāti attho. Kāmarāgena ḍayhāmīti
anya-e0103n1:113_1: kāmarāgagginā pariḍayhāmi. So ca pana dāho idāni cittagatoti dassento āha ‘‘cittaṁ
anya-e0103n1:113_2: me pariḍayhatī’’ti. Sādhūti āyācanā. Nibbāpananti tassa nibbāpanupāyaṁ. Gotamāti
anya-e0103n1:114_1: Nimittaṁ parivajjehi kīdisaṁ? Rāgūpasañhitaṁ rāguppattihetubhūtaṁ subhanimittaṁ parivajjehi
anya-e0103n1:114_2: na manasi karohi. Na kevalaṁ subhanimittassāmanasikāro eva, atha kho asubhabhāvanāya
anya-e0103n1:114_3: attano cittaṁ bhāvehi. Kathaṁ? Ekaggaṁ susamāhitaṁ yathā taṁ asubhārammaṇe vikkhepābhāvena
anya-e0103n1:114_4: ekaggaṁ, suṭṭhu appitabhāvena susamāhitañca hoti, evaṁ bhāvehīti. Evaṁ samathabhāvanāya
anya-e0103n1:114_5: kāmarāgassa vikkhambhanaṁ dassetvā idāni samucchedanavidhiṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘saṅkhāre’’tiādi
anya-e0103n1:114_6: vuttaṁ. Tattha saṅkhāre parato passāti sabbepi saṅkhāre avidheyyakatāya ‘‘pare’’ti
anya-e0103n1:114_7: passa. Aniccatāya pana udayabbayapaṭipīḷitattā dukkhato, anattasabhāvattā, attavirahato
anya-e0103n1:114_8: ca no attato passa. Evaṁ lakkhaṇattayaṁ āropetvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhento maggapaṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0103n1:114_9: catutthamaggena sabbaso nibbāpehi mahārāgaṁ tebhūmakassa abhibhavanato mahāvisayatāya
anya-e0103n1:114_10: mahārāgaṁ vūpasamehi. Yathā etarahi, evaṁ mā ḍayhittho punappunanti daḷhataraṁ rāgavinodane niyojesi.
anya-e0103n1:115_0: Evaṁ indriyasaṁvarasīlassa sampādane vidhiṁ dassetvā evaṁ taṁ susampāditaṁ hotīti
anya-e0103n1:115_1: nayaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘apicā’’tiādinā tattha paripūrakārino there nidasseti. Tattha ‘‘leṇaṁ
anya-e0103n1:115_2: na ullokitapubba’’nti idaṁ sabbattheva therassa yugamattadassitāya vuttaṁ. Kiṁ pana
anya-e0103n1:115_3: thero senāsanaṁ na sodheti ? ‘‘Ullokā paṭhamaṁ ohāretabba’’nti hi vuttaṁ, antevāsikādayo
anya-e0103n1:115_4: eva kirassa senāsanaṁ sodhenti. Assa nāgarukkhassa.
anya-e0103n1:116_0: Tasmiṁ gāmeti mahāgāme. Taruṇā thaññapivanakā puttadhītaro yāsaṁ tā taruṇaputtā,
anya-e0103n1:116_1: tāsaṁ. Lañjāpesīti thanapaṭṭikāya thane bandhāpetvā rājamuddikāya lañjāpesi. Rājā
anya-e0103n1:116_2: theraṁ cirataraṁ daṭṭhuṁ kālavikkhepaṁ karonto ‘‘sve sīlāni gaṇhissāmī’’ti āha. Thero
anya-e0103n1:116_3: rañño ca deviyā ca vandanakāle sattākāramattaṁ gaṇhāti. Itthī purisoti pana vivekaṁ
anya-e0103n1:116_4: na karoti. Tenāha ‘‘vavatthānaṁ na karomī’’ti. ‘‘Aho suparisuddhasīlo vatāyaṁ ayyo’’ti
anya-e0103n1:116_5: daṇḍadīpikaṁ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi. Atiparisuddhaṁ pākaṭanti sappāyalābhena kammaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0103n1:116_6: ativiya parisuddhaṁ vibhūtaṁ ahosi. Sakalaṁ pabbataṁ unnādayantoti pathavikampanena
anya-e0103n1:116_7: sakalaṁ pabbataṁ ekaṁ ninnādaṁ karonto. Tannivāsidevatānaṁ sādhukāradānenāti keci.
anya-e0103n1:116_8: Bhantoti anavaṭṭhito. Bāloti taruṇadārako. Utrastoti ñātakehi vinābhāvena santrasto.
anya-e0103n1:117_1: Yato pabbajito, tato paṭṭhāya pabbajitakālato pabhutīti attho. Indriyānīti indriyasaṁvarasīlāni.
anya-e0103n1:117_2: Tesu hi bhinnesu indriyānipi bhinnānīti vuccanti ārakkhābhāvato, indriyāneva vā nimittānubyañjanaggāhassa
anya-e0103n1:117_3: dvārabhūtāni bhinnāni nāma taṁsamaṅgino anatthuppattito, vipariyāyato abhinnānīti
anya-e0103n1:117_4: veditabbāni. Indriyānaṁ vā ayoniso upasaṁhāro bhedanaṁ, yoniso upasaṁhāro abhedananti
anya-e0103n1:117_5: apare. Mittattherovāti mahāmittatthero viya. Vareti seṭṭhe.
anya-e0103n1:118_0: Tathā vīriyenāti tathā-saddena vīriyaṁ viseseti. Yathā sati anavajjalakkhaṇāva indriyasaṁvarasādhanaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:118_1: tathā vīriyaṁ anavajjalakkhaṇaṁ ājīvapārisuddhisādhananti. Vīriyāpekkhameva visesanaṁ
anya-e0103n1:118_2: daṭṭhabbaṁ. Tenevāha ‘‘sammāāraddhavīriyassā’’ti. Ayuttā esanā anesanā, yathāvuttamicchājīvasaṅgahā.
anya-e0103n1:118_3: Sā eva satthusāsanassa na patirūpāti appatirūpaṁ, taṁ anesanaṁ appatirūpaṁ. Atha
anya-e0103n1:118_4: vā patirūpavirodhinī appatirūpā, pariggahitadhutaṅgassa dhutaṅganiyamavirodhinī yassa
anya-e0103n1:118_5: kassaci sallekhavikopinī paṭipatti. Imasmiṁ pakkhe ca-saddo luttaniddiṭṭho, anesanaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:118_6: appatirūpañca pahāyāti. Paṭisevamānena parivajjayatā sampādetabbāti sambandho. ‘‘Parisuddhuppāde’’ti
anya-e0103n1:118_7: imināva dhammadesanādīnaṁ parisuddhāya samuṭṭhānatā dīpitā hotīti ‘‘dhammadesanādīhi
anya-e0103n1:118_9: gahaṇaṁ veditabbaṁ. Dhutaguṇe cassa pasannānanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Piṇḍapātacariyādīhīti
anya-e0103n1:118_11: taṁtaṁdhutaṅganiyatāya paṭipattiyā anulomavasena, avikopanavasenāti attho. Mahicchasseva
anya-e0103n1:118_12: micchājīvena jīvikā, na appicchassa. Appicchatāya ukkaṁsagatāya micchājīvassa asambhavo
anya-e0103n1:118_13: evāti dassetuṁ ‘‘ekabyādhivūpasamattha’’ntiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha pūtiharitakīti pūtimuttaparibhāvitaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:118_14: pūtibhāvena vā chaḍḍitaṁ haritakaṁ. Ariyavaṁso etassa atthīti, ariyavaṁse vā niyuttoti
anya-e0103n1:118_15: ariyavaṁsiko, paccayagedhassa dūrasamussāritattā uttamo ca so ariyavaṁsiko cāti uttamaariyavaṁsiko.
anya-e0103n1:119_0: Nimittaṁ nāma paccaye uddissa yathā adhippāyo ñāyati evaṁ nimittakammaṁ. Obhāso nāma
anya-e0103n1:119_1: ujukameva akathetvā yathā adhippāyo vibhūto hoti, evaṁ obhāsanaṁ. Parikathā nāma
anya-e0103n1:119_2: pariyāyena kathanaṁ. Tathā uppannanti nimittādivasena uppannaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:120_0: Dvāraṁ dinnanti rogasīsena paribhogassa dvāraṁ dinnaṁ. Tasmā arogakālepi paribhuñjituṁ
anya-e0103n1:120_1: vaṭṭati, āpatti na hotīti attho. Tenāha ‘‘kiñcāpi āpatti na hotī’’tiādi. Na vaṭṭatīti
anya-e0103n1:120_2: sallekhapaṭipattiyaṁ ṭhitassa na vaṭṭati, sallekhaṁ kopetīti adhippāyo. ‘‘Ājīvaṁ
anya-e0103n1:120_3: pana kopetī’’ti imināva senāsanapaṭisaṁyuttadhutaṅgadharassa nimittādayo na vaṭṭantīti
anya-e0103n1:120_4: vadanti. Tadaññadhutaṅgadharassāpi na vaṭṭantiyevāti apare. Akarontoti yathāsakaṁ
anya-e0103n1:121_0: Gaṇavāsaṁ pahāya araññāyatane paṭippassaddhivivekassa muddhabhūtāya aggaphalasamāpattiyā
anya-e0103n1:121_1: viharanto mahāthero ‘‘pavivekaṁ brūhayamāno’’ti vutto. Udarasannissito vātābādho
anya-e0103n1:121_2: udaravātābādho. Asambhinnaṁ khīraṁ etassāti asambhinnakhīraṁ, tadeva pāyāsanti asambhinnakhīrapāyāsaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:121_3: udakena asammissakhīrena pakkapāyāsanti attho. Tassāti pāyāsassa. Uppattimūlanti
anya-e0103n1:121_4: ‘‘gihikāle me, āvuso, mātā sappimadhusakkarādīhi yojetvā asambhinnakhīrapāyāsaṁ adāsi,
anya-e0103n1:121_5: tena me phāsu ahosī’’ti attano vacīnicchāraṇasaṅkhātaṁ uppattihetuṁ. ‘‘Aparibhogāraho
anya-e0103n1:121_6: piṇḍapāto’’ti kasmā vuttaṁ, nanu therassa obhāsanādicittuppattiyeva natthīti? Saccaṁ
anya-e0103n1:121_7: natthi, ajjhāsayaṁ pana ajānantā ekacce puthujjanā tathā maññeyyuṁ, anāgate ca sabrahmacārino
anya-e0103n1:121_8: evaṁ mama diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjeyyunti paṭikkhipi. Apica mahātherassa paramukkaṁsagatā
anya-e0103n1:121_9: sallekhapaṭipatti. Tathā hi daharabhikkhuno ‘‘kassa sampannaṁ na manāpa’’nti (pāci.
anya-e0103n1:121_10: 209, 257, 612, 1228, 1234; cūḷava. 343) vacanaṁ nissāya yāva parinibbānā piṭṭhakhādanīyaṁ na khādati.
anya-e0103n1:122_0: Vacīviññattivipphārāti vacīnicchāraṇahetu. Atthaviññāpanavasena pavattamāno hi saddo
anya-e0103n1:122_1: asatipi viññattiyā tassa kenaci paccayena paccayabhāve vacīviññattivaseneva pavattatīti
anya-e0103n1:122_2: ‘‘vacīviññattivipphāro’’ti vuccati. Bhuttoti bhuttavā sace bhaveyyaṁ ahaṁ. Sāti assa.
anya-e0103n1:122_3: Akāralopena hi niddeso ‘‘evaṁsa te’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.23; a. ni. 6.58; 8.7) viya.
anya-e0103n1:122_4: Antaguṇanti antabhogo. Bahi careti āsayato nikkhamitvā gocaraggahaṇavasena bahi yadi
anya-e0103n1:122_5: vicareyya. Paramappicchaṁ dassetuṁ lokavohārenevamāha. Loke hi ayuttabhojanaṁ odariyaṁ
anya-e0103n1:122_6: garahantā evaṁ vadanti ‘‘kiṁsu nāma tassa antāni bahi carantī’’ti. Ārādhemīti ādito
anya-e0103n1:123_0: Mahātissatthero kira dubbhikkhakāle maggaṁ gacchanto bhattacchedena, maggakilamathena
anya-e0103n1:123_1: ca kilantakāyo dubbalo aññatarassa phalitassa ambassa mūle nipajji, bahūni ambaphalāni
anya-e0103n1:123_2: tahaṁ tahaṁ patitāni honti. Tattheko vuḍḍhataro upāsako therassa santikaṁ upagantvā
anya-e0103n1:123_3: parissamaṁ ñatvā ambapānaṁ pāyetvā attano piṭṭhiṁ āropetvā vasanaṭṭhānaṁ neti. Thero –
anya-e0103n1:124: ‘‘Na pitā napi te mātā, na ñāti napi bandhavo;
anya-e0103n1:126_0: Attānaṁ ovaditvā sammasanaṁ ārabhitvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā tassa piṭṭhigato eva maggapaṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0103n1:126_1: arahattaṁ sacchākāsi. Imaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ ‘‘ambakhādakamahātissattheravatthupi cettha
anya-e0103n1:127_1: ānisaṁsassa ca dassanaṁ ādīnavānisaṁsadassanaṁ. Tassa pana paccayādhikārattā vuttaṁ
anya-e0103n1:127_2: ‘‘paccayesū’’ti. Kāraṇakāraṇampi hi kāraṇabhāvena vuccati yathā tiṇehi bhattaṁ siddhanti.
anya-e0103n1:127_3: Yena kāraṇena bhikkhuno apaccavekkhitaparibhogo nāma siyā, tasmiṁ vajjite paccayasannissitasīlaṁ
anya-e0103n1:127_4: sijjhati, visujjhati cāti dassetuṁ ‘‘tasmā’’tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha paccayagedhanti
anya-e0103n1:127_5: gedhaggahaṇeneva sammohopi gahitoti daṭṭhabbo tena saha pavattanato, tadupanissayato
anya-e0103n1:127_6: ca. Dhammena samena uppanneti idaṁ paccayānaṁ āgamanasuddhidassanaṁ, na paccayasannissitasīlavisuddhidassanaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:127_7: Paccayānaṁ hi idamatthitaṁ upadhāretvā paribhuñjanaṁ paccayasannissitasīlaṁ. Yasmā
anya-e0103n1:127_8: pana te paccayā ñāyādhigatā eva bhikkhunā paribhuñjitabbā, tasmā vuttaṁ ‘‘dhammena
anya-e0103n1:127_9: samena uppanne paccaye’’ti. Yathāvuttena vidhināti ‘‘sītassa paṭighātāyā’’tiādinā
anya-e0103n1:128_0: Dhātuvasenavāti ‘‘yathāpaccayaṁ vattamānaṁ dhātumattamevetaṁ, yadidaṁ cīvarādi, tadupabhuñjako
anya-e0103n1:128_1: ca puggalo’’ti evaṁ dhātumanasikāravasena vā. Paṭikūlavasena vāti piṇḍapāte tāva
anya-e0103n1:128_2: āhāre paṭikūlasaññāvasena, ‘‘sabbāni pana imāni cīvarādīni ajigucchanīyāni, imaṁ
anya-e0103n1:128_3: pūtikāyaṁ patvā ativiya jigucchanīyāni jāyantī’’ti evaṁ paṭikūlamanasikāravasena
anya-e0103n1:128_4: vā. Tato uttarīti paṭilābhakālato upari. Anavajjovaparibhogo āditova paññāya parisodhitattā
anya-e0103n1:128_7: tasmiṁ paribhogakāle paccavekkhaṇe. Sanniṭṭhānakaroti asandehakaro ekantiko.
anya-e0103n1:129_0: Theyyaparibhogo nāma anarahassa paribhogo. Bhagavatāpi attano sāsane sīlavato paccayā
anya-e0103n1:129_1: anuññātā, na dussīlassa. Dāyakānampi sīlavato eva pariccāgo, na dussīlassa. Attano
anya-e0103n1:129_2: kārānaṁ mahapphalabhāvassa paccāsīsanato. Iti satthārā ananuññātattā, dāyakehi ca
anya-e0103n1:129_3: apariccattattā dussīlassa paribhogo theyyāya paribhogo theyyaparibhogo. Iṇavasena
anya-e0103n1:129_4: paribhogo iṇaparibhogo, paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyā abhāvato iṇaṁ gahetvā paribhogo
anya-e0103n1:129_5: viyāti attho. Tasmāti ‘‘sīlavato’’tiādinā vuttamevatthaṁ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati.
anya-e0103n1:129_6: Cīvaraṁ kāyato mocetvā paribhoge paribhoge purebhatta…pe… pacchimayāmesu paccavekkhitabbanti
anya-e0103n1:129_7: sambandho. Tathā asakkontena yathāvuttakālavisesavasena ekadivase catukkhattuṁ tikkhattuṁ
anya-e0103n1:129_8: dvikkhattuṁ sakiṁyeva vā paccavekkhitabbaṁ. Sace aruṇaṁ uggacchati, iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne
anya-e0103n1:129_9: tiṭṭhati. Hiyyo yaṁ mayā cīvaraṁ paribhuttaṁ, taṁ yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya…pe…
anya-e0103n1:129_10: hirikopīnapaṭicchādanatthaṁ. Hiyyo yo mayā piṇḍapāto paribhutto, so ‘‘neva davāyā’’tiādinā
anya-e0103n1:129_11: sace atītaparibhogapaccavekkhaṇaṁ na kareyyāti vadanti, taṁ vīmaṁsitabbaṁ. Senāsanampi
anya-e0103n1:129_12: paribhoge paribhogeti pavese pavese. Satipaccayatāti satiyā paccayabhāvo paṭiggahaṇassa,
anya-e0103n1:129_13: paribhogassa ca paccavekkhaṇasatiyā paccayabhāvo yujjati, paccavekkhitvāva paṭiggahetabbaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:129_14: paribhuñjitabbañcāti attho. Tenevāha ‘‘satiṁ katvā’’tiādi. Evaṁ santepīti yadipi
anya-e0103n1:129_15: dvīsupi ṭhānesu paccavekkhaṇā yuttā, evaṁ santepi. Apare panāhu – sati paccayatāti
anya-e0103n1:129_16: sati bhesajjaparibhogassa paccayabhāve, sati paccayeti attho. Evaṁ santepīti paccaye
anya-e0103n1:129_17: satipīti. Taṁ tesaṁ matimattaṁ. Tathā hi paccayasannissitasīlaṁ paccavekkhaṇāya visujjhati,
anya-e0103n1:130_0: Evaṁ paccayasannissitasīlassa visuddhiṁ dassetvā teneva pasaṅgena sabbāpi visuddhiyo
anya-e0103n1:130_1: dassetuṁ ‘‘catubbidhā hi suddhī’’tiādimāha. Tattha sujjhati etāyāti suddhi, yathādhammaṁ
anya-e0103n1:130_2: desanāva suddhi desanāsuddhi. Vuṭṭhānassāpi cettha desanāya eva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n1:130_3: Chinnamūlāpattīnaṁ pana abhikkhutāpaṭiññāva desanā. Adhiṭṭhānavisiṭṭho saṁvarova
anya-e0103n1:130_4: suddhi saṁvarasuddhi. Dhammena samena paccayānaṁ pariyeṭṭhi eva suddhi pariyeṭṭhisuddhi.
anya-e0103n1:130_5: Catūsupi paccayesu vuttavidhinā paccavekkhaṇāva suddhi paccavekkhaṇasuddhi. Esa tāva
anya-e0103n1:130_6: suddhīsu samāsanayo. Suddhimantesu pana desanā suddhi etassāti desanāsuddhi. Sesesupi
anya-e0103n1:130_7: eseva nayo. Suddhi-saddo pana vuttanayova. Evanti saṁvarabhedaṁ sandhāyāha. Pahāyāti
anya-e0103n1:131_0: Dātabbaṭṭhena dāyaṁ, taṁ ādiyantīti dāyādā. Ananuññātesu sabbena sabbaṁ paribhogābhāvato,
anya-e0103n1:131_1: anuññātesu eva ca paribhogasambhavato bhikkhūhi paribhuñjitabbapaccayā bhagavato
anya-e0103n1:131_2: santakā. ‘‘Dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha mā āmisadāyādā. Atthi me tumhesu
anya-e0103n1:131_3: anukampā ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṁ no āmisadāyādā’’’ti (ma. ni. 1.29)
anya-e0103n1:131_4: evaṁ pavattaṁ dhammadāyādasuttañca ettha etasmiṁ atthe sādhakaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:132_0: Avītarāgānaṁ taṇhāparavasatāya paccayaparibhoge sāmibhāvo natthi, tadabhāvena vītarāgānaṁ
anya-e0103n1:132_1: tattha sāmibhāvo yathāruciparibhogasambhavato. Tathā hi te paṭikūlampi appaṭikūlākārena,
anya-e0103n1:132_2: appaṭikūlampi paṭikūlākārena, tadubhayampi vajjetvā ajjhupekkhanākārena paccaye paribhuñjanti,
anya-e0103n1:132_3: dāyakānañca manorathaṁ paripūrenti. Tenāha ‘‘te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṁ atītattā sāmino
anya-e0103n1:133_0: Sabbesanti ariyānaṁ, puthujjanānañca. Kathaṁ puthujjanānaṁ ime paribhogā sambhavanti?
anya-e0103n1:133_1: Upacāravasena. Yo hi puthujjanassāpi sallekhapaṭipattiyaṁ ṭhitassa paccayagedhaṁ
anya-e0103n1:133_2: pahāya tattha tattha anupalittena cittena paribhogo, so sāmiparibhogo viya hoti.
anya-e0103n1:133_3: Sīlavato pana paccavekkhitaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo viya hoti, dāyakānaṁ manorathassa
anya-e0103n1:133_4: avirādhanato. Tathā hi vuttaṁ ‘‘dāyajjaparibhogeyeva vā saṅgahaṁ gacchatī’’ti. Kalyāṇaputhujjanassa
anya-e0103n1:133_5: paribhoge vattabbameva natthi, tassa sekkhasaṅgahato. Sekkhasuttaṁ (saṁ. ni. 5.13)
anya-e0103n1:133_6: hetassatthassa sādhakaṁ. Tenāha ‘‘sīlavāpihī’’tiādi. Paccanīkattāti yathā iṇāyiko
anya-e0103n1:133_7: attano ruciyā icchitadesaṁ gantuṁ na labhati, evaṁ iṇaparibhogayutto lokato nissarituṁ
anya-e0103n1:133_8: na labhatīti tappaṭipakkhattā sīlavato paccavekkhitaparibhogo āṇaṇyaparibhogoti āha
anya-e0103n1:133_10: paribhogoti dasseti. Imāya sikkhāyāti sīlasaṅkhātāya sikkhāya. Kiccakārīti paṭiññānurūpaṁ
anya-e0103n1:134_0: Idāni tameva kiccakāritaṁ suttapadena vibhāvetuṁ ‘‘vuttampi ceta’’ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:134_1: Tattha vihāranti patissayaṁ. Sayanāsananti mañcādiṁ. Ubhayenapi senāsanameva vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:134_2: Āpanti udakaṁ. Saṅghāṭirajūpavāhananti paṁsumalādino saṅghāṭigatarajassa dhovanaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:134_3: Sutvāna dhammaṁ sugatena desitanti cīvarādīsu ‘‘paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṁ paṭisevati
anya-e0103n1:134_4: sītassa paṭighātāyā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.23; a. ni. 6.58; mahāni. 206) nayena bhagavatā
anya-e0103n1:134_5: desitaṁ dhammaṁ sutvā. Saṅkhāya seve varapaññasāvakoti ‘‘piṇḍa’’nti vuttaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:134_6: vihārādipadehi vuttaṁ senāsanaṁ, ‘‘pipāsāgelaññassa vūpasamanato pānīyampi gilānapaccayo’’ti
anya-e0103n1:134_7: āpamukhena dassitaṁ gilānapaccayaṁ, saṅghāṭiyādicīvaranti catubbidhaṁ paccayaṁ saṅkhāya
anya-e0103n1:134_8: ‘‘yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.23; 2.24; 3.75; saṁ. ni. 4.120;
anya-e0103n1:134_9: a. ni. 6.58; 8.9; dha. sa. 1355) nayena paccavekkhitvā. Seve sevituṁ sakkuṇeyya uttamapaññassa
anya-e0103n1:134_10: bhagavato sāvako sekho vā puthujjano vā.
anya-e0103n1:135_0: Yasmā ca saṅkhāya sevī varapaññasāvako, tasmā hi piṇḍe…pe… pokkhare vāribindu, tathā
anya-e0103n1:135_1: hoti. Kālenāti ariyānaṁ bhojanakāle. Laddhāti labhitvā. Paratoti aññato dāyakato.
anya-e0103n1:135_2: Anuggahāti anukampāya bahumhi upanīte mattaṁ so jaññā jāneyya satataṁ sabbakālaṁ
anya-e0103n1:135_3: upaṭṭhito upaṭṭhitassati. Ālepanarūhane yathāti bhesajjalepanena vaṇassa ruhane viya,
anya-e0103n1:135_4: mattaṁ jāneyyāti yojanā. Āhareti āhareyya. ‘‘Āhareyyāhāra’’nti vā pāṭho. Yāpanatthanti
anya-e0103n1:135_5: sarīrassa yāpanāya. Amucchitoti taṇhāmucchāya amucchito gedhaṁ taṇhaṁ anāpanno.
anya-e0103n1:136_0: Attano mātulassa saṅgharakkhitattherasseva nāmassa gahitattā bhāgineyyasaṅgharakkhitasāmaṇero.
anya-e0103n1:136_1: Sālikūranti sālibhattaṁ. Sunibbutanti susītalaṁ. Asaññatoti apaccavekkhaṇaṁ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0103n1:138_0: 20. Pariyanto etesaṁ atthīti pariyantāni, pariyantāni sikkhāpadāni yesaṁ te pariyantasikkhāpadā,
anya-e0103n1:138_2: tadaññesaṁ upasampannānaṁ. Sāmaññajotanāpi hi visese tiṭṭhati. Kusaladhamme yuttānanti
anya-e0103n1:138_3: vipassanācāre yuttapayuttānaṁ. Sekkhadhammā pariyantā paramā mariyādā etassāti sekkhapariyanto.
anya-e0103n1:138_4: Nāmarūpaparicchedato, kusaladhammasamādānato vā pana paṭṭhāya yāva gotrabhū, tāva
anya-e0103n1:138_5: pavattakusaladhammappabandho sekkhadhamme āhacca ṭhito sekkhapariyanto. Sekkhadhammānaṁ
anya-e0103n1:138_6: vā heṭṭhimantabhūtā sikkhitabbā lokiyā tisso sikkhā sekkhapariyanto, tasmiṁ sekkhapariyante.
anya-e0103n1:138_7: Paripūrakārīnanti kiñcipi sikkhaṁ ahāpetvā pūrentānaṁ. Uparivisesādhigamatthaṁ kāye
anya-e0103n1:138_8: ca jīvite ca anapekkhānaṁ. Tato eva sīlapāripūriatthaṁ pariccattajīvitānaṁ. Diṭṭhisaṁkilesena
anya-e0103n1:138_9: aparāmasanīyato pārisuddhivantaṁ sīlaṁ aparāmaṭṭhapārisuddhisīlaṁ. Kilesānaṁ sabbaso
anya-e0103n1:139_0: Anupasampannānaṁ asekkhānaṁ, sekkhānaṁ, kalyāṇaputhujjanānañca sīlaṁ mahānubhāvatāya
anya-e0103n1:139_1: ānubhāvato apariyantamevāti āha ‘‘gaṇanavasena sapariyantattā’’ti. Kāyavācānaṁ saṁvaraṇato,
anya-e0103n1:139_2: vinayanato ca saṁvaravinayā. Peyyālamukhena niddiṭṭhāti tattha tattha satthārā desitavitthāranayena
anya-e0103n1:139_3: yathāvuttagaṇanato niddiṭṭhā. Sikkhāti sīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā. Vinayasaṁvareti vinayapiṭake.
anya-e0103n1:139_4: Gaṇanavasena sapariyantampi upasampannānaṁ sīlanti heṭṭhā vuttaṁ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:139_5: Yaṁ kiñci hi upasampannena sikkhitabbaṁ sīlaṁ nāma, tattha kassacipi anavasesato
anya-e0103n1:139_6: anavasesavasena. Samādānabhāvanti samādānasabbhāvaṁ. Lābha…pe… vasena adiṭṭhapariyantabhāvo
anya-e0103n1:140_0: Dhanaṁ caje aṅgavarassa hetu pāripanthikacorādīhi upadduto. Aṅgaṁ caje jīvitaṁ rakkhamāno
anya-e0103n1:140_1: sappadaṭṭhādikāle. Aṅgaṁ dhanaṁ jīvitañcāpi sabbaṁ, caje naro dhammamanussaranto
anya-e0103n1:140_3: Jighacchāparissamena jīvitasaṁsaye satipi. Sikkhāpadaṁ avītikkammāti assāmikesu ambaphalesu
anya-e0103n1:140_4: bhūmiyaṁ patitesu samīpeyeva santesupi paṭiggāhakābhāvena aparibhuñjanto paṭiggahaṇasikkhāpadaṁ avītikkamitvā.
anya-e0103n1:141_0: Sīlavantassāti sīlavantabhāvassa kāraṇā, sīlavantassa vā tuyhaṁ etādisaṁ aṁsena vāhaṇādikaṁ
anya-e0103n1:141_1: kiccaṁ karoti, kāraṇā sīlassāti adhippāyo. Sudhotajātimaṇi viyāti catūsu pāsāṇesu
anya-e0103n1:141_4: ca. ‘‘Kimatthaṁ mayaṁ idhāgatā’’ti mahājanassa vippaṭisāro bhavissatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n1:141_5: Accharikāyāti aṅguliphoṭanena. Asatiyāti satisammosena. Aññāṇapakatanti aññāṇena
anya-e0103n1:142_0: Appassutopi ce hotīti suttageyyādisutarahito hoti ce. Sīlesu asamāhitoti pātimokkhasaṁvarādisīlesupi
anya-e0103n1:142_1: na sammā patiṭṭhito hoti ce. Nāssa sampajjate sutanti assa sīlarahitassa puggalassa
anya-e0103n1:142_2: sutaṁ attano, paresañca katthaci bhavasampattiāvahaṁ na hoti. ‘‘Dussīloyaṁ purisapuggalo’’ti
anya-e0103n1:142_3: hi sikkhākāmā na tassa santikaṁ upasaṅkamanti. Bahussutopi ceti ettha ce-ti nipātamattaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:143_0: Rāgavasena aparāmaṭṭhagahaṇena taṇhāparāmāsābhāvamāha. Tathārūpanti rāgavasena aparāmaṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:143_1: Bhinditvāti hanitvā. Saññapessāmīti saññattiṁ karissāmi, appakaṁ velaṁ maṁ vissejjetunti
anya-e0103n1:144_0: Palipannoti sīdanto, sammakkhito vā. Sīleneva saddhiṁ marissāmīti sīlaṁ avināsento
anya-e0103n1:144_1: tena saheva marissāmi, na idāni kadācipi taṁ pariccajissāmi. Sati hi bhavādāne sīlena
anya-e0103n1:144_2: viyogo siyā, bhavameva nādiyissāmīti adhippāyo. Rogaṁ sammasantoti rogabhūtaṁ vedanaṁ
anya-e0103n1:144_3: vedanāmukhena sesārūpadhamme, rūpadhamme ca pariggahetvā vipassanto.
anya-e0103n1:145_0: Ruppatoti vikāraṁ āpādiyamānasarīrassa. Parisussatīti samantato sussati. Yathā kiṁ?
anya-e0103n1:145_1: Pupphaṁ yathā paṁsuni ātape kataṁ sūriyātapasantatte paṁsuni ṭhapitaṁ sirīsādipupphaṁ
anya-e0103n1:145_2: viyāti attho. Ajaññanti amanuññaṁ jigucchanīyaṁ. Jaññasaṅkhātanti bālehi ‘‘jañña’’nti
anya-e0103n1:145_3: evaṁ kittitaṁ. Jaññarūpaṁ apassatoti yathābhūtaṁ appassato aviddasuno ‘‘jañña’’nti
anya-e0103n1:145_4: pasaṁsitaṁ. Dhiratthumanti dhi atthu imaṁ, dhi-saddayogena sabbattha upayogavacanaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:145_5: imassa pūtikāyassa dhikāro hotūti attho. Duggandhiyanti duggandhikaṁ duggandhavantaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:145_6: Yattha yathāvutte pūtikāye rāgahetu pamattā pamādaṁ āpannā. Pajāti sattā. Hāpenti
anya-e0103n1:145_7: maggaṁ sugatūpapattiyāti sugatūpapattiyā maggaṁ, sīlampi hāpenti, pageva jhānādinti
anya-e0103n1:145_8: adhippāyo. Kevalaṁ ‘‘arahanto’’ti vattabbā sāvakakhīṇāsavā, itare pana paccekabuddhā
anya-e0103n1:147_1: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Pahānādīti ādi-saddena veramaṇiādīnaṁ catunnaṁ. Kesuci potthakesu
anya-e0103n1:147_2: ‘‘pahānavasenā’’ti likhanti, sā pamādalekhā. Pāṇātipātassa pahānaṁ sīlanti hirottappakaruṇālobhādipamukhena
anya-e0103n1:147_3: yena kusalacittuppādena pāṇātipāto pahīyati, taṁ pāṇātipātassa pahānaṁ sīlanaṭṭhena
anya-e0103n1:147_4: sīlaṁ. Tathā pāṇātipātā virati veramaṇī sīlaṁ. Pāṇātipātassa paṭipakkhacetanā cetanā
anya-e0103n1:147_5: sīlaṁ. Pāṇātipātassa saṁvaraṇaṁ pavesadvārapidhānaṁ saṁvaro sīlaṁ. Pāṇātipātassa
anya-e0103n1:147_6: avītikkamanaṁ avītikkamo sīlaṁ. Adinnādānassātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Abhijjhādīnaṁ
anya-e0103n1:147_7: pana anabhijjhādivasena pahānaṁ veditabbaṁ. Veramaṇī cetanā taṁsampayuttā saṁvarāvītikkamā tappamukhā dhammā.
anya-e0103n1:148_0: Evaṁ dasakusalakammapathavasena pahānasīlādīni dassetvā idāni saupāyānaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ
anya-e0103n1:148_1: samāpattīnaṁ, aṭṭhārasannaṁ mahāvipassanānaṁ, ariyamaggānañca vasena tāni dassetuṁ
anya-e0103n1:148_3: Kusalā hi dhammā kāmapaṭipakkhā idha ‘‘nekkhamma’’nti adhippetā. Tenāha ‘‘kāmacchandassa
anya-e0103n1:148_4: pahānaṁ sīla’’ntiādi. Tattha pahānasīlādīni heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Visesameva
anya-e0103n1:148_5: vakkhāma. Abyāpādenāti mettāya. Ālokasaññāyāti vibhūtaṁ katvā manasikaraṇena upaṭṭhitaālokasañjānanena
anya-e0103n1:149_1: vuttāya paṭhamajjhānādhigamassa upāyabhūtāya pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya vasena pahānasīlādīni
anya-e0103n1:149_2: dassetvā idāni saupāyānaṁ aṭṭhasamāpattiādīnaṁ vasena dassetuṁ ‘‘ñāṇenā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:149_3: Nāmarūpapariggahakaṅkhāvitaraṇānaṁ hi vibandhabhūtassa mohassa dūrīkaraṇena ñātapariññāya
anya-e0103n1:149_4: ṭhitassa aniccasaññādayo sijjhanti. Tathā jhānasamāpattīsu abhiratinimittena pāmojjena.
anya-e0103n1:149_5: Tattha anabhiratiyā vinoditāya jhānādīnaṁ samadhigamoti samāpattivipassanānaṁ arativinodanaavijjāpadālanādinā
anya-e0103n1:149_6: upāyoti vuttaṁ ‘‘ñāṇena avijjāya, pāmojjena aratiyā’’ti. Uppaṭipāṭiniddeso pana nīvaraṇasabhāvāya
anya-e0103n1:150_0: ‘‘Paṭhamenajhānena nīvaraṇāna’’ntiādīsu kathaṁ jhānānaṁ sīlabhāvo, kathaṁ vā tattha
anya-e0103n1:150_1: viratiyā sambhavo. Suvisuddhakāyakammādikassa hi cittasamādānavasena imāni jhānāni
anya-e0103n1:150_2: pavattanti, na parittakusalāni viya kāyakammādivisodhanavasena, nāpi maggaphaladhammā
anya-e0103n1:150_4: nippariyāyena natthi sīlanaṭṭho, kuto viramaṇaṭṭho. Pariyāyena panetaṁ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:150_5: Ko pana so pariyāyo? Yadaggena mahaggatā kusaladhammā paṭipakkhe pajahanti, tadaggena
anya-e0103n1:150_6: tato oratā. Te ca yathā cittaṁ nārohanti, evaṁ saṁvutā nāma honti. Pariyuṭṭhānasaṅkhāto
anya-e0103n1:150_7: manodvāre vītikkamo natthi etesūti avītikkamāti ca vuccanti, cetanā pana taṁsampayuttāti.
anya-e0103n1:150_8: Soyamattho parato āgamissati. Evañca katvā vitakkādipahānavacanampi samatthitaṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n1:150_9: Na hi nippariyāyato sīlaṁ kusaladhammānaṁ pahāyakaṁ yujjati, na cettha akusalavitakkādayo
anya-e0103n1:150_10: adhippetā. Kiñcāpi paṭhamajjhānūpacāreyeva dukkhassa, catutthajjhānūpacāre ca sukhassa
anya-e0103n1:150_11: pahānaṁ hoti, atisayapahānaṁ pana sandhāya vuttaṁ ‘‘catutthena jhānena sukhadukkhānaṁ
anya-e0103n1:151_0: Aniccassa, aniccanti vā anupassanā aniccānupassanā. Tebhūmikadhammānaṁ aniccataṁ
anya-e0103n1:151_1: gahetvā pavattāya vipassanāyetaṁ nāmaṁ. Niccasaññāyāti ‘‘saṅkhatadhammā niccā sassatā’’ti
anya-e0103n1:151_2: evaṁ pavattāya micchāsaññāya, saññāggahaṇeneva diṭṭhicittānampi gahaṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:151_3: Esa nayo ito parāsupi. Nibbidānupassanāyāti saṅkhāresu nibbindanākārena pavattāya
anya-e0103n1:151_4: anupassanāya. Nandiyāti sappītikataṇhāya. Virāgānupassanāyāti virajjanākārena pavattāya
anya-e0103n1:151_5: anupassanāya. Rāgassāti saṅkhāresu rāgassa. Nirodhānupassanāyāti saṅkhārānaṁ nirodhassa
anya-e0103n1:151_6: anupassanāya. Yathā vā saṅkhārā nirujjhantiyeva, āyatiṁ punabbhavavasena na uppajjanti,
anya-e0103n1:151_7: evaṁ anupassanā nirodhānupassanā. Tenevāha ‘‘nirodhānupassanāya nirodheti no samudetī’’ti
anya-e0103n1:151_8: (paṭi. ma. 1.83). Muñcitukāmatāya hi ayaṁ balappattā. Saṅkhārānaṁ paṭinissajjanākārena
anya-e0103n1:151_9: pavattā anupassanā paṭinissaggānupassanā. Paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā hi ayaṁ . Ādānassāti
anya-e0103n1:151_11: tassā ghanasaññāya. Āyūhanassāti abhisaṅkharaṇassa. Saṅkhārānaṁ avatthādivisesāpatti
anya-e0103n1:151_13: sakiccaparicchedatāya ca saṅkhārānaṁ saviggahatāya. Paṇidhiyāti rāgādipaṇidhiyā,
anya-e0103n1:151_14: taṇhāvasena saṅkhāresu ninnatāyāti attho. Abhinivesassāti attānudiṭṭhiyā. Aniccadukkhādivasena
anya-e0103n1:151_18: loko samuppanno’’ti abhiniveso sammohābhiniveso. Ucchedasassatābhinivesoti keci.
anya-e0103n1:151_19: ‘‘Ahosiṁ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna’’ntiādinayappavattā (ma. ni. 1.18; saṁ. ni. 2.20;
anya-e0103n1:151_20: mahāni. 174) saṁsayāpatti sammohābhinivesoti apare. Saṅkhāresu tāṇaleṇabhāvagahaṇaṁ
anya-e0103n1:151_22: saṁ. ni. 1.172; mahāva. 7-8) vacanato ālayo taṇhā. Sā eva cakkhādīsu, rūpādīsu ca
anya-e0103n1:151_23: abhinivisanavasena pavattiyā ālayābhinivesoti apare. ‘‘Evaṁ ṭhitā te saṅkhārā paṭinissajjīyantī’’ti
anya-e0103n1:151_24: pavattaṁ ñāṇaṁ paṭisaṅkhānupassanā. Appaṭisaṅkhā paṭisaṅkhāya paṭipakkhabhūtā mohappadhānā
anya-e0103n1:151_25: akusaladhammā. Vaṭṭato vigatattā vivaṭṭaṁ nibbānaṁ, tattha ninnabhāvasaṅkhātena anupassanena
anya-e0103n1:151_26: pavatti vivaṭṭānupassanā, saṅkhārupekkhā ceva anulomañāṇañca. Saññogābhiniveso saṁyujjanavasena
anya-e0103n1:152_0: Diṭṭhekaṭṭhānanti diṭṭhiyā sahajekaṭṭhānañca pahānekaṭṭhānañca. Oḷārikānanti uparimaggavajjhe
anya-e0103n1:152_1: kilese upādāya vuttaṁ. Aññathā dassanena pahātabbāpi dutiyamaggavajjhehi oḷārikā.
anya-e0103n1:152_2: Aṇusahagatānanti aṇubhūtānaṁ, idaṁ heṭṭhimamaggavajjhe upādāya vuttaṁ. Sabbakilesānanti
anya-e0103n1:152_3: avasiṭṭhasabbakilesānaṁ. Na hi paṭhamamaggādīhi pahīnā kilesā puna pahīyanti.
anya-e0103n1:153_1: kho, ānanda, kusalāni sīlānī’’ti (a. ni. 10.1) vacanato cetaso avippaṭisāratthāya
anya-e0103n1:153_2: bhavanti. Avippaṭisāro pāmojjatthāya. ‘‘Yoniso manasi karoto pāmojjaṁ jāyatī’’ti
anya-e0103n1:153_3: (dī. ni. 3.359) vacanato pāmojjāya saṁvattanti. Pāmojjaṁ pītiyā. ‘‘Pamuditassa pīti
anya-e0103n1:153_4: jāyatī’’ti (dī. ni. 1.466; 3.359; a. ni. 3.96; 6.10; 11.12) vacanato pītiyā saṁvattanti.
anya-e0103n1:153_5: Pīti passaddhatthāya. ‘‘Pītimanassa kāyo passambhatī’’ti (dī. ni. 1.466; 3.359; a.
anya-e0103n1:153_6: ni. 3.96; 6.10; 11.12) vacanato passaddhiyā saṁvattanti. Passaddhi sukhatthāya. ‘‘Passaddhakāyo
anya-e0103n1:153_7: sukhaṁ vedetī’’ti (dī. ni. 1.466; 3.359; a. ni. 3.96; 6.10; 11.12) vacanato somanassāya
anya-e0103n1:153_8: saṁvattantīti. ‘‘Sukhatthāya sukhaṁ vedetī’’ti cettha somanassaṁ ‘‘sukha’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:153_9: Āsevanāyāti samādhissa āsevanāya. Nirāmise hi sukhe siddhe ‘‘sukhino cittaṁ samādhiyatī’’ti
anya-e0103n1:153_10: (dī. ni. 1.466; 3.359; a. ni. 3.96; 6.10; 11.12) vacanato samādhi siddhoyeva hoti,
anya-e0103n1:153_11: tasmā samādhissa āsevanāya paguṇabalavabhāvāya saṁvattantīti attho. Bhāvanāyāti tasseva
anya-e0103n1:153_12: samādhissa vaḍḍhiyā. Bahulīkammāyāti punappunaṁ kiriyāya. Alaṅkārāyāti tasseva samādhissa
anya-e0103n1:153_14: samādhisambhārassa siddhiyā tasseva samādhissa parikkhārāya saṁvattanti. Sambhārattho
anya-e0103n1:153_15: hi idha parikkhāra-saddo. ‘‘Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā’’tiādīsu
anya-e0103n1:153_16: (ma. ni. 1.191) viya sambhāroti ca paccayo veditabbo. Kāmañcāyaṁ parikkhāra-saddo
anya-e0103n1:153_18: suparikkhattaṁ hotī’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 7.67) parivārattho vutto. Idha pana alaṅkāraparivārānaṁ
anya-e0103n1:153_19: visuṁ gahitattā ‘‘sambhārattho’’ti vuttaṁ . Parivārāyāti mūlakāraṇabhāveneva samādhissa
anya-e0103n1:154_0: Evaṁ suparisuddhasīlamūlakaṁ sabbākāraparipūraṁ samādhiṁ dassetvā idāni ‘‘samāhito
anya-e0103n1:154_1: pajānāti passati, yathābhūtaṁ jānaṁ passaṁ nibbindati, nibbindaṁ virajjati , virāgā
anya-e0103n1:154_2: vimuccatī’’ti (a. ni. 10.2; sa. ni. 3.14) vacanato sīlamūlakāni samādhipadaṭṭhānāni
anya-e0103n1:154_3: payojanāni dassetuṁ ‘‘ekantanibbidāyā’’tiādi vuttaṁ. Nibbidāya hi dassitāya tassā
anya-e0103n1:154_4: padaṭṭhānabhūtaṁ yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ dassitameva hoti, tasmiṁ asati nibbidāya
anya-e0103n1:154_5: asijjhanato. Nibbidādayo atthato vibhattā eva. Yathābhūtañāṇadassananti panettha
anya-e0103n1:155_0: Idāni pahānādīsu sīlatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘ettha cā’’tiādi āraddhaṁ. Tattha pajahanaṁ
anya-e0103n1:155_1: anuppādanirodho pahānanti tassa bhāvasādhanataṁ sandhāya ‘‘pahānanti koci dhammo
anya-e0103n1:155_2: nāma natthī’’ti vuttaṁ. Yathā panassa dhammabhāvo sambhavati, tathā heṭṭhā saṁvaṇṇitameva.
anya-e0103n1:155_3: Evaṁ hissa sīlabhāvo suṭṭhu yujjati. Taṁ taṁ pahānanti ‘‘pāṇātipātassa pahānaṁ, adinnādānassa
anya-e0103n1:155_4: pahāna’’nti evaṁ vuttaṁ taṁ taṁ pahānaṁ. Tassa tassa kusaladhammassāti pāṇātipātassa
anya-e0103n1:155_5: pahānaṁ mettādikusaladhammassa, adinnādānassa pahānaṁ cāgādikusaladhammassāti evaṁ
anya-e0103n1:155_6: tassa tassa kusaladhammassa. Patiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti patiṭṭhānabhāvena. Pahānaṁ hi tasmiṁ
anya-e0103n1:155_7: sati hoti, asati na hoti, tassa ‘‘patiṭṭhāna’’nti vattabbataṁ labhatīti katvā yasmiṁ
anya-e0103n1:155_8: santāne pāṇātipātādayo tassa pakampahetavoti tappahānaṁ vikampābhāvakaraṇena ca samādhānaṁ
anya-e0103n1:155_9: vuttaṁ. Evaṁ sesapahānesupi vattabbaṁ. Samādhānaṁ saṇṭhapanaṁ, saṁyamanaṁ vā. Itare
anya-e0103n1:155_10: cattāroti veramaṇiādayo cattāro dhammā na pahānaṁ viya vohāramattanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n1:155_11: Tato tatoti tamhā tamhā pāṇātipātādito. Tassa tassāti pāṇātipātādikassa saṁvaraṇavasena,
anya-e0103n1:155_12: tassa tassa vā saṁvarassa vasena. Tadubhayasampayuttacetanāvasenāti veramaṇīhi, saṁvaradhammehi
anya-e0103n1:155_13: ca sampayuttāya cetanāya vasena. Taṁ taṁ avītikkamantassāti taṁ taṁ pāṇātipātādiṁ
anya-e0103n1:155_14: avītikkamantassa puggalassa, dhammasamūhassa vā vasena cetaso pavattisabbhāvaṁ sandhāya
anya-e0103n1:157_0: 21. Saṁkilissati tenāti saṁkileso. Ko pana soti āha ‘‘khaṇḍādibhāvo sīlassa saṁkileso’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:157_1: Vodāyati visujjhati etenāti vodānaṁ, akhaṇḍādibhāvo. Lābhayasādīti ādi-saddena ñātiaṅgajīvitādīnaṁ
anya-e0103n1:157_2: saṅgaho. Sattasu āpattikkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā vemajjheti ca idaṁ tesaṁ uddesādipāḷivasena
anya-e0103n1:157_3: vuttaṁ. Na hi añño koci āpattikkhandhānaṁ anukkamo atthi. Khaṇḍanti khaṇḍavantaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:157_4: khaṇḍitaṁ vā. Chiddanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Pariyante chinnasāṭako viyāti vatthante,
anya-e0103n1:158_0: Evanti idāni vuccamānākārena. Methunasaṁyogavasenāti rāgapariyuṭṭhānena sadisabhāvāpattiyā
anya-e0103n1:158_1: mithunānaṁ idanti methunaṁ, nibandhanaṁ. Methunavasena samāyogo methunasaṁyogo. Idha
anya-e0103n1:158_2: pana methunasaṁyogo viyāti methunasaṁyogo, tassa vasena. Idhāti imasmiṁ loke. Ekaccoti
anya-e0103n1:158_3: eko. Samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vāti pabbajjāmattena samaṇo vā jātimattena brāhmaṇo vā. Dvayaṁdvayasamāpattinti
anya-e0103n1:158_4: dvīhi dvīhi samāpajjitabbaṁ, methunanti attho. Na heva kho samāpajjatīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n1:158_5: Ucchādanaṁ ubbattanaṁ. Sambāhanaṁ parimaddanaṁ. Sādiyatīti adhivāseti. Tadassādetīti
anya-e0103n1:158_6: taṁ ucchādanādiṁ abhiramati. Nikāmetīti icchati. Vittinti tuṭṭhiṁ. Idampi khoti ettha
anya-e0103n1:158_7: idanti yathāvuttaṁ sādiyanādiṁ khaṇḍabhāvādivasena ekaṁ katvā vuttaṁ. Pi-saddo vakkhamānaṁ
anya-e0103n1:158_8: upādāya samuccayattho. Kho-saddo avadhāraṇattho. Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – yadetaṁ brahmacārīpaṭiññassa
anya-e0103n1:158_10: idampi ekaṁsena tassa brahmacariyassa khaṇḍādibhāvāpādanato khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi
anya-e0103n1:158_11: kammāsampīti. Evaṁ pana khaṇḍādibhāvāpattiyā so aparisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carati,
anya-e0103n1:158_12: na parisuddhaṁ, saṁyutto methunasaṁyogena, na visaṁyutto. Tato cassa na jātiādīhi
anya-e0103n1:159_0: Sañjagghatīti kilesavasena mahāhasitaṁ hasati. Saṁkīḷatīti kāyasaṁsaggavasena kīḷati.
anya-e0103n1:159_1: Saṁkelāyatīti sabbaso mātugāmaṁ kelāyanto viharati. Cakkhunāti attano cakkhunā. Cakkhunti
anya-e0103n1:159_2: mātugāmassa cakkhuṁ. Upanijjhāyatīti upecca nijjhāyati oloketi. Tirokuṭṭāti kuṭṭassa
anya-e0103n1:159_3: parato. Tathā tiropākārā. Mattikāmayā bhitti kuṭṭaṁ, iṭṭhakāmayā pākāroti vadanti.
anya-e0103n1:159_4: Yā kāci vā bhitti porisato diyaḍḍharatanuccappamāṇā kuṭṭaṁ, kuṭṭato adhiko pākāro.
anya-e0103n1:160_0: Assāti brahmacārīpaṭiññassa. Pubbeti vatasamādānato pubbe. Kāmaguṇehīti kāmakoṭṭhāsehi.
anya-e0103n1:160_1: Samappitanti suṭṭhu appitaṁ sahitaṁ. Samaṅgībhūtanti samannāgataṁ. Paricārayamānanti
anya-e0103n1:160_2: kīḷantaṁ, upaṭṭhahiyamānaṁ vā. Paṇidhāyāti patthetvā. Sīlenātiādīsu yamaniyamādisamādānavasena
anya-e0103n1:160_3: sīlaṁ. Avītikkamavasena vataṁ. Ubhayampi sīlaṁ. Dukkaracariyavasena pavattitaṁ vataṁ.
anya-e0103n1:160_4: Taṁtaṁakiccasammatato vā nivattilakkhaṇaṁ sīlaṁ. Taṁtaṁsamādānavato vesabhojanakiccakaraṇādivisesapaṭipatti
anya-e0103n1:160_5: vataṁ. Sabbathāpi dukkaracariyā tapo. Methunavirati brahmacariyaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:161_0: Sabbasoti anavasesato, sabbesaṁ vā. Abhedenāti avītikkamena. Aparāya ca pāpadhammānaṁ
anya-e0103n1:161_1: anuppattiyā, guṇānaṁ uppattiyā saṅgahitoti yojanā. Tattha kujjhanalakkhaṇo kodho.
anya-e0103n1:161_2: Upanandhanalakkhaṇo upanāho. Paresaṁ guṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo makkho. Yugaggāhalakkhaṇo
anya-e0103n1:161_5: thaddhabhāvalakkhaṇo thambho. Karaṇuttariyalakkhaṇo sārambho. Unnatilakkhaṇo māno.
anya-e0103n1:161_6: Abbhunnatilakkhaṇo atimāno. Majjanalakkhaṇo mado. Cittavosaggalakkhaṇo pamādo. Ādi-saddena
anya-e0103n1:162_0: Idāni ‘‘akhaṇḍādibhāvo panā’’tiādinā vuttamevatthaṁ pākaṭataraṁ kātuṁ ‘‘yāni hī’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n1:162_1: Tattha anupahatānīti anupaddutāni. Vivaṭṭūpanissayatāya taṇhādāsabyato mocanena bhujissabhāvakaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:162_2: Aviññūnaṁ appamāṇattā vuttaṁ ‘‘viññūhi pasatthattā’’ti. Samādhisaṁvattanaṁ vā etesaṁ
anya-e0103n1:162_3: payojanaṁ, samādhisaṁvattane vā niyuttānīti samādhisaṁvattanikāni. Niddānena sassasampatti
anya-e0103n1:162_4: viya paṭipakkhavigamena sīlasampadā, sā ca tattha sati dosadassaneti āha ‘‘sīlavipattiyā
anya-e0103n1:162_5: ca ādīnavadassanenā’’ti. Nisammakārīnaṁ payojanagarukatāya diṭṭhaguṇeyeva sammāpaṭipattīti
anya-e0103n1:163_0: Tattha sīlavipattiyā ādīnavo sīlasampadāya heṭṭhā dassitaānisaṁsapaṭipakkhato veditabbo,
anya-e0103n1:163_1: taṁ suviññeyyanti avitthāretvā pakārantarehi dassetuṁ ‘‘apicā’’ti āraddhaṁ. Tattha
anya-e0103n1:163_2: yathā sīlasampadā sattānaṁ manuññabhāvakāraṇaṁ, evaṁ sīlavipatti amanuññabhāvakāraṇanti
anya-e0103n1:163_3: āha ‘‘dussīlo…pe… devamanussāna’’nti. Ananusāsanīyo jigucchitabbato. Dukkhitoti sañjātadukkho.
anya-e0103n1:163_4: Vippaṭisārīti ‘‘akataṁ vata me kalyāṇa’’ntiādinā paccānutāpī. Dubbaṇṇoti guṇavaṇṇena,
anya-e0103n1:163_5: kāyavaṇṇena ca virahito. Assāti dussīlassa. Samphassitānaṁ dukkho dukkhāvaho samphasso
anya-e0103n1:163_6: etassāti dukkhasamphasso. Guṇānubhāvābhāvato appaṁ agghatīti appaggho. Anekavassagaṇikagūthakūpo
anya-e0103n1:163_7: viyāti anekavassasamūhe sañcitukkārāvāṭo viya. Dubbisodhano sodhetuṁ asakkuṇeyyo.
anya-e0103n1:163_8: Chavālātaṁ chavaḍāhe santajjanummukkaṁ. Ubhato paribāhiroti sāmaññato, gihibhogato
anya-e0103n1:163_9: ca parihīno. Sabbesaṁ verī, sabbe vā verī etassāti sabbaverī, so eva sabbaveriko,
anya-e0103n1:163_10: puriso. Saṁvāsaṁ nārahatīti asaṁvāsāraho. Saddhammeti paṭipattisaddhamme, paṭivedhasaddhamme ca.
anya-e0103n1:164_2: ca assādena gadhitacittā pañcakāma…pe… gadhitacittā, tesaṁ. Te yathāvuttasukhassādā
anya-e0103n1:165_0: Passatha noti passatha nu, api passatha. Mahantanti vipulaṁ. Aggikkhandhanti aggisamūhaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:165_1: Ādittanti padittaṁ. Sampajjalitanti samantato pajjalitaṁ acchivipphuliṅgāni muccantaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:165_2: Sajotibhūtanti sapabhaṁ samantato uṭṭhitāhi jālāhi ekappabhāsamudayabhūtaṁ. Taṁ kiṁ
anya-e0103n1:165_3: maññathāti taṁ idāni mayā vuccamānamatthaṁ kiṁ maññathāti anumatigahaṇatthaṁ pucchati.
anya-e0103n1:165_4: Āliṅgetvāti upagūhitvā. Upanisīdeyyāti teneva āliṅganena upecca nisīdeyya. Yadatthamettha
anya-e0103n1:165_5: satthā aggikkhandhāliṅganaṁ, kaññāliṅganañca ānesi, tamatthaṁ vibhāvetuṁ ‘‘ārocayāmī’’tiādimāha
anya-e0103n1:165_6: . Tattha ārocayāmīti āmantemi. Voti tumhe. Paṭivedayāmīti pabodhemi. Dussīlassāti
anya-e0103n1:165_7: nissīlassa sīlavirahitassa. Pāpadhammassāti dussīlattā eva hīnajjhāsayatāya lāmakasabhāvassa.
anya-e0103n1:165_9: saritabbasamācārassa. Dussīlo hi kiñcideva asāruppaṁ disvā ‘‘idaṁ asukena kataṁ bhavissatī’’ti
anya-e0103n1:165_10: paresaṁ āsaṅkanīyova hoti, kenacideva vā karaṇīyena mantayante bhikkhū disvā ‘‘kacci
anya-e0103n1:165_11: nu kho ime mayā kataṁ kammaṁ jānitvā mantentī’’ti attanoyeva saṅkāya saritabbasamācāroti.
anya-e0103n1:165_13: na samaṇassa. Salākaggahaṇādīsu ‘‘ahampi samaṇo’’ti micchāpaṭiññāya samaṇapaṭiññassa.
anya-e0103n1:165_15: brahmacāripaṭiññassa. Pūtinā kammena sīlavipattiyā anto anupaviṭṭhattā antopūtikassa.
anya-e0103n1:165_16: Chahi dvārehi rāgādikilesānuvassanena tintattā avassutassa. Sañjātarāgādikacavarattā,
anya-e0103n1:165_17: sīlavantehi chaḍḍetabbattā ca kasambujātassa. Aggikkhandhūpamāya hīnūpamabhūtāyāti
anya-e0103n1:165_18: attho. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘etadeva tassa vara’’nti. Bhagavā dukkhaṁ dassetvā dukkhaṁ
anya-e0103n1:166_0: Vāḷarajjuyāti vāḷehi katarajjuyā. Sā hi kharatarā hoti. Ghaṁseyyāti padhaṁsanavasena
anya-e0103n1:166_1: ghaṁseyya. Teladhotāyāti telena nisitāya. Paccorasminti patiurasmiṁ urābhimukhaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:166_2: uramajjheti adhippāyo. Ayosaṅkunāti saṇḍāsena. Pheṇuddehakanti pheṇaṁ uddehetvā,
anya-e0103n1:167_0: Aggikkhandhāliṅganadukkhatopi adhimattadukkhatāya kaṭukabhūtaṁ dukkhaṁ phalaṁ etassāti
anya-e0103n1:167_2: dussīlassa kuto tassa sukhaṁ natthevāti adhippāyo. Sādaneti sādiyane. Yanti añjalikammasādanaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:167_3: Asīlinoti dussīlassa. Upahatanti sīlabyasanena upaddutaṁ. Khatanti kusalamūlānaṁ
anya-e0103n1:167_4: khaṇanena khataṁ, khaṇitaṁ vā guṇaṁ sarīreti adhippāyo. Sabbabhayehīti attānuvādādisabbabhayehi.
anya-e0103n1:168_1: Kāyagandhopi pāmojjaṁ, sīlavantassa bhikkhuno. Karoti api devānanti ettha ‘‘gandho
anya-e0103n1:168_2: isīnaṁ ciradikkhitāna’’ntiādikā (jā. 2.17.55) gāthā vitthāretabbā. Avighātīti appaṭighātī.
anya-e0103n1:168_3: Vadhabandhādiparikilesā diṭṭhadhammikā āsavā upaddavā. Samparāyikadukkhānaṁ mūlaṁ
anya-e0103n1:168_4: nāma dussīlyaṁ. Antamatikkantaṁ accantaṁ, accantaṁ santā accantasantā kilesapariḷāhasaṅkhātadarathānaṁ
anya-e0103n1:168_5: abhāvena sabbadā santā. Ubbijjitvāti ñāṇutrāsena uttasitvā. Vodāpetabbanti visodhetabbaṁ.
